author: Emilio Gonzalez
description: Blend with too much ice and you will have a tasteless slushy drink that will give you brain-ache if you drink it too fast. However, made correctly and fine strained this is a superbly refreshing drink on a hot day.
name: Daiquiri (frozen)
recipeIngredient: 60 ml White/gold 1-3 year old mellow light rum
22.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: BLEND all ingredients with 6oz scoop of crushed ice and then STRAIN blended drink through a fine strainer to remove ice slush
